record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business today, and if the Republican leader has nothing further, I now ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:02 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, April 11, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
